name: Picomize
tag_list: photography, advertising, advertising-agency, stock-photography, technology, start-up, crowd-source
overview:
What is Picomize.com?

Picomize makes it simple for agencies to find the right image for their campaign by enabling them to work directly with Picomize photographers who learn and adapt to their photo needs.

Here’s how it works:

You fill out an online form, which takes less than 5 minutes, describing your ideal image.

You then designate how long the challenge will run and receive 50 to 100 unique photos within that time frame. You are able to communicate directly with the photographers, choose the winning picture, and purchase it for your use.

The benefits of Picomize

Provide creative direction by communicating directly with photographers during the challenge. Your comments of submitted photographs will refine your need, inspire the artists, and most importantly help the photographers learn what images you like for the current and future challenges. • Tell them what you like and don’t like about an image • Ask them to try new angles, different lighting, etc. • Find out more about their image • As you look for photos throughout your campaigns life our photographers will learn what you like and don’t like.

Become inspired yourself through interaction with hundreds of artists who each bring a unique perspective and experience.
